API Collection# Deprecated Symbols

## [Topics](/documentation/AppKit/bezelstyle-deprecated-symbols#topics)

### [Properties](/documentation/AppKit/bezelstyle-deprecated-symbols#Properties)

[`static var inline: NSButton.BezelStyle`](/documentation/appkit/nsbutton/bezelstyle-swift.enum/inline)A button that has a solid round-rectangle border background.Deprecated[`static var recessed: NSButton.BezelStyle`](/documentation/appkit/nsbutton/bezelstyle-swift.enum/recessed)A bezel style appropriate for use in scope bars and title bar accessories, similar to the bookmarks bar in Safari.Deprecated[`static var regularSquare: NSButton.BezelStyle`](/documentation/appkit/nsbutton/bezelstyle-swift.enum/regularsquare)A rectangular button with a two-point border, designed for icons.Deprecated[`static var rounded: NSButton.BezelStyle`](/documentation/appkit/nsbutton/bezelstyle-swift.enum/rounded)A rounded rectangle button, designed for text.Deprecated[`static var roundedDisclosure: NSButton.BezelStyle`](/documentation/appkit/nsbutton/bezelstyle-swift.enum/roundeddisclosure)A bezel style for use with a vertically expanding and collapsing disclosure button.Deprecated[`static var roundRect: NSButton.BezelStyle`](/documentation/appkit/nsbutton/bezelstyle-swift.enum/roundrect)A bezel style appropriate for use as an action or auxiliary button in scope bars and title bar accessories.Deprecated[`static var texturedRounded: NSButton.BezelStyle`](/documentation/appkit/nsbutton/bezelstyle-swift.enum/texturedrounded)A bezel style appropriate for use in the toolbar or title bar regions of a window.Deprecated### [Constants](/documentation/AppKit/bezelstyle-deprecated-symbols#Constants)

[`case shadowlessSquare`](/documentation/appkit/nsbutton/bezelstyle-swift.enum/shadowlesssquare)A rectangular button with no shadow, so it can abut the cells without overlapping shadows.Deprecated[`case texturedSquare`](/documentation/appkit/nsbutton/bezelstyle-swift.enum/texturedsquare)A bezel style appropriate for use with textured (metal) windows.Deprecated
